verses.verse: I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3628>mercies<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, that ye <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, which is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3050>reasonable<s%> <S%G2999>service<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4964>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4964>conformed<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> be ye <S%G3339>transformed<s%> by the <S%G342>renewing<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> may <S%G1381>prove<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is that <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2101>acceptable<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%>, <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, to every <S%G3956>man<s%> that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> to think of himself <S%G3844>more<s%> <S%G5252>highly<s%> <S%G3739>than<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G1519%G4993>soberly<s%>, according <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G3307>dealt<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4234>office<s%>:

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2070>we<s%>, being <S%G4183>many<s%>, <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> one of <S%G240>another<s%>.

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> <S%G1313>differing<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, let us prophesy <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G356>proportion<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>;
<S%G1535>Or<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%>, let us wait <S%G1722>on<s%> our <S%G1248>ministering<s%>: <S%G1535>or<s%> he that <S%G1321>teacheth<s%>, <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G1319>teaching<s%>;

<S%G1535>Or<s%> he that <S%G3870>exhorteth<s%>, <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3874>exhortation<s%>: he that <S%G3330>giveth<s%>, let him do it <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G572>simplicity<s%>; he that <S%G4291>ruleth<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%>; he that sheweth <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2432>cheerfulness<s%>.
Let <S%G26>love<s%> be without <S%G505>dissimulation<s%>. <S%G655>Abhor<s%> that which is <S%G4190>evil<s%>; <S%G2853>cleave<s%> to that which is <S%G18>good<s%>.
Be kindly <S%G5387>affectioned<s%> one to <S%G1519%G240>another<s%> with brotherly <S%G5360>love<s%>; in <S%G5092>honour<s%> <S%G4285>preferring<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>;
<S%G3361>Not<s%> <S%G3636>slothful<s%> in <S%G4710>business<s%>; <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit<s%>; <S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>;
<S%G5463>Rejoicing<s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%>; <S%G5278>patient<s%> in <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>; continuing <S%G4342>instant<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%>;
<S%G2841>Distributing<s%> to the <S%G5532>necessity<s%> of <S%G40>saints<s%>; <S%G1377>given<s%> to <S%G5381>hospitality<s%>.
<S%G2127>Bless<s%> them which <S%G1377>persecute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G2127>bless<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2672>curse<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>.
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> them that do <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> them that <S%G2799>weep<s%>.

Be of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> one toward <S%G1519%G240>another<s%>. <S%G5426>Mind<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> high <S%G5308>things<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4879>condescend<s%> to men of low <S%G5011>estate<s%>. <S%G1096>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G3844>in<s%> your own <S%G1438>conceits<s%>.

<S%G591>Recompense<s%> to no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>. <S%G4306>Provide<s%> things <S%G2570>honest<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.
<S%G1487>If<s%> it be <S%G1415>possible<s%>, as much as lieth <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, live <S%G1514>peaceably<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

Dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G1556>avenge<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> rather <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> unto <S%G3709>wrath<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G1557>Vengeance<s%> is <S%G1698>mine<s%>; <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G467>repay<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemy<s%> <S%G3983>hunger<s%>, <S%G5595>feed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G1372>thirst<s%>, <S%G4222>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4222>drink<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> thou shalt <S%G4987>heap<s%> <S%G440>coals<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%>.
<S%G3528>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>.
